trans-unit.source: Enables JScript to communicate with an external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 可讓 JScript 與外部 COM 屬性進行通訊。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by an external COM implementation to expose its objects to JScript because JScript needs a managed <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> in order to bind to an external object.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可由外部 COM 實來公開其為 JScript 物件，因為 JScript 需要 managed<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>才能繫結至外部物件。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes that are associated with this property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性與相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyAttributes>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyAttributes></xref:System.Reflection.PropertyAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the property can be read.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以讀取屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the property can be written to.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以寫入屬性至。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that declares this property.
trans-unit.target: 取得宣告此屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: null, because the type that declares this property is an external COM object.
trans-unit.target: null，因為宣告這個屬性的型別是外部的 COM 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array whose elements contain the get and set accessors of the external COM property that this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得的陣列，其項目包含 get 和 set 存取子，這個物件所代表之外部 COM 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include non-public accessors.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含非公用存取子。

trans-unit.source: A two-element array of <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> objects that contains the get and set methods of this property.
trans-unit.target: 兩個元素陣列<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>物件，其中包含 get 和 set 方法，這個屬性。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 取得受管理的物件，可讓 JScript 與這個外部 COM 屬性進行通訊。

trans-unit.source: A managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 受管理的物件，可讓 JScript 與這個外部 COM 屬性進行通訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含這個屬性未附加的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this property, searching only for attributes of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含附加至這個屬性，只會搜尋指定型別的屬性的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns the get accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個屬性的 get 存取子。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include non-public accessors.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含非公用存取子。

trans-unit.source: The get accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的 get 存取子。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the index parameters for the property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之屬性的所有索引參數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns the set accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個屬性的 set 存取子。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include non-public accessors.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含非公用存取子。

trans-unit.source: The set accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的 set 存取子。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the external COM property by using the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo"></xref> that was specified to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得外部 COM 屬性的值使用<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo"> </xref> ，指定要<xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize*>方法。</xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize*>

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 您想要取得其屬性值的物件。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.
trans-unit.target: 控制繫結的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，將類型從實質引數型別轉換成正式引數類型。

trans-unit.source: The argument list to pass to the external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給外部 COM 屬性的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.
trans-unit.target: 提供特定文化特性或地區設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
trans-unit.target: 用來正確地格式化數字、 日期和字串。

trans-unit.source: The value of the external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 外部 COM 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the information that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化可讓 JScript 與這個外部 COM 屬性通訊的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the external COM property that this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件所代表之外部 COM 屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Information that enables JScript to access the external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 可讓 JScript 存取外部 COM 屬性的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this property.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的屬性類型，是否要附加至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The attribute type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of member that this property is.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的成員類型。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of class derived from <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> that this class derives from.
trans-unit.target: 識別的類別衍生自類型<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>這個類別衍生自。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref>, because this class derives from <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref>因為這個類別衍生自<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the external COM property that this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個物件所代表之外部 COM 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the external COM property that this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件所代表之外部 COM 屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來取得這個執行個體，透過反映的類別物件。

trans-unit.source: null, because this instance was not obtained through reflection.
trans-unit.target: null，因為未透過反映來取得這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the external COM property by using the <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo"></xref> that was specified to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize*> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定外部 COM 屬性的值使用<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo"> </xref> ，指定要<xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize*>方法。</xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize*>

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其屬性值的物件。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the external COM member.
trans-unit.target: 新外部 COM 成員的值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.
trans-unit.target: 控制繫結的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，將類型從實質引數型別轉換成正式引數類型。

trans-unit.source: The argument list to pass to the external COM property.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給外部 COM 屬性的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.
trans-unit.target: 提供特定文化特性或地區設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
trans-unit.target: 用來正確地格式化數字、 日期和字串。
